backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing the game backend with high score tracking (top 10), player profile management, XP/level calculation, and role-based access control for score submission and profile updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented feature IDs (zombie mesh redesigns, animations, UI changes, etc.) to their affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing their roles and recent changes across game components, hooks, and UI screens.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS entry point that imports Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, borders, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the FPS Zombie Shooter app that mounts the React root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing screen navigation (menu, game, gameover, leaderboard, controls, profile) and passing game result data (score, wave, kills, headshots, shotsFired) between screens.
frontend/src/components/ControlsScreen.t: Static controls reference screen rendered in Borderlands toon style that lists all keyboard and mouse bindings with a back button.
frontend/src/components/Game/DesertEnvir: 3D desert scene component that renders procedurally generated buildings with windows and trim, palm trees, a Pack-a-Punch machine, mountain barriers, sand, and sky using toon shading materials.
frontend/src/components/Game/EnemyMesh.t: Renders animated 3D enemy meshes (zombie variants) using toon shading, with walking animations, hit flash effects, and death fade-out transitions driven by useFrame.
frontend/src/components/Game/FirstPerson: Implements first-person player movement with WASD/sprint/jump controls, mouse-look, AABB collision detection against procedural geometry and game objects, and auto-fire input handling.
frontend/src/components/Game/GameScene.t: Main game scene orchestrator that composes the 3D canvas with enemies, weapons, HUD, wave system, raycasting-based shooting with headshot detection, and game-over logic.
frontend/src/components/Game/HUD.tsx: Renders the 2D heads-up display including health bar, ammo counter, crosshair, wave info, score, kill streak, points notifications, and Pack-a-Punch upgrade prompts.
frontend/src/components/Game/MountainBar: Generates and renders a procedural rocky mountain ring barrier using distorted cone, box, and icosahedron geometries with seeded randomness for a deterministic toon-shaded environment boundary.
frontend/src/components/Game/MuzzleFlash: Displays a brief animated muzzle flash sphere at a given position that fades out over ~80ms when the weapon fires.
frontend/src/components/Game/PackAPunchM: Renders an animated 3D Pack-a-Punch upgrade machine in the game arena with tier-based color schemes, pulsing glow effects, screen flicker, and floating particles using React Three Fiber.
frontend/src/components/Game/PalmTree.ts: Procedurally generates a realistic 3D palm tree mesh with a tapered/swaying trunk, drooping fronds, and coconut clusters using seeded RNG for deterministic per-tree variation.
frontend/src/components/Game/PauseOverla: Displays a styled full-screen pause menu overlay with a resume button and instructions when the game is paused.
Renders a floating, rotating 3D pickup item (health or ammo) that detects player proximity and triggers collection callbacks with appropriate effects.
frontend/src/components/Game/ToonMateria: Provides React hooks that create and cache custom Three.js shader materials for a toon/cel-shading effect and a back-face outline effect.
frontend/src/components/Game/WaveOverlay: Displays a styled UI overlay showing wave countdown, boss warnings, and wave-cleared messages based on the current wave phase state.
frontend/src/components/Game/WeaponViewM: Renders first-person 3D weapon view models with recoil/reload animations and upgrade-tier visual effects including glow overlays and gold sparkle particles.
frontend/src/components/GameOver.tsx: Displays the game-over screen with final stats, leaderboard score submission, and profile stat updates to the backend when the player is authenticated.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Renders a styled leaderboard UI showing top player scores and wave numbers, fetched via the useLeaderboard hook, with special styling for the top 3 ranks.
frontend/src/components/MainMenu.tsx: Displays the main menu screen with game title, navigation buttons, and an Internet Identity authentication panel for sign-in/sign-out.
frontend/src/components/PlayerProfile.ts: Shows the authenticated player's profile including level, XP progress bar, and stat cards, fetched via useGetOrCreateProfile.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnemySystem.ts: Manages enemy and pickup state for the game, including spawning enemies, applying damage with headshot logic, tracking score/points, and emitting floating points notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameAudio.ts: Provides memoized callbacks for playing synthesized game sound effects (gunshots, zombie sounds, pickups, wave events) based on weapon type or game event.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login, logout, identity, and status state to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaderboard.ts: React Query hook that fetches high scores from the backend actor and provides a mutation to submit a new score, invalidating the leaderboard cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Aggregates React Query hooks for player profile management: re-exports useLeaderboard, and provides useGetOrCreateProfile and useUpdateProfile for authenticated profile fetching and updating.
frontend/src/hooks/useWaveSystem.ts: Manages wave-based game progression with phases (menu, countdown, active, cleared, gameover), handling countdown timers, enemy spawning parameters, and wave-clear detection based on active enemy count.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeaponSystem.ts: Manages weapon state including firing, reloading, switching, recoil, and upgrade tiers for three weapons (pistol, shotgun, assault rifle), with keyboard input handling for weapon selection.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining a desert/Borderlands-themed design system with custom CSS variables, Tailwind integration, and reusable component classes (toon-btn, toon-panel, hud-text) using Bangers and Oswald fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/shaders/sandShader.ts: GLSL shaders for a procedural sand terrain: the vertex shader applies value-noise-based dune displacement, and the fragment shader renders warm sandy tones with subtle stripe patterns.
frontend/src/shaders/skyShader.ts: GLSL shaders for a desert sky dome that blends burnt orange at the horizon to deep red-purple at the zenith, with an added sun glow effect near the horizon.
frontend/src/shaders/toonShader.ts: GLSL shaders implementing a Borderlands-style cel-shading effect with 4-step posterized diffuse lighting, rim highlights, hit-flash inversion, and a solid dark outline pass.
frontend/src/types/enemy.ts: TypeScript type definitions for Enemy (with health, position, attack, and state fields) and Pickup (health or ammo collectibles) used in the game.
frontend/src/types/weapon.ts: TypeScript type definitions and configuration constants for the three weapons (pistol, shotgun, assault rifle), including fire rate, damage, ammo, reload time, upgrade costs, and damage multipliers.
frontend/src/utils/audioSynthesis.ts: Provides procedural Web Audio API sound synthesis functions for game weapons (pistol, shotgun, assault rifle) and zombie growls using noise buffers, oscillators, and gain/filter envelopes.
frontend/src/utils/levelSystem.ts: Implements a 1â€“55 level progression system with XP thresholds using the formula `100 + i*(i+1)*80`, exposing helpers to calculate current level, XP boundaries, and percentage progress to the next level.
frontend/src/utils/proceduralGeometry.ts: Generates deterministic procedural level geometry data (buildings, ruins, barriers, rubble, mountain ring segments) using a seeded RNG, and derives axis-aligned collision bounding boxes for player collision detection.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routes, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive parameters from the URL bar without a page reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom desert/zombie-game theme with oklch color tokens, toon-shadow box shadows, custom fonts (Bangers, Oswald), and keyframe animations for hit flashes, damage overlays, and accordion transitions.
project_state.json: Project state manifest tracking the current version, existing implemented features (CoD-style zombie mesh redesigns and lurch animations), and a pending feature request to further improve zombie models.
